title: Aomekie Red Dot Sight Airsoft Scope Reflex Sight 3 Brightness Setting with Fiber Optic Sight 20mm/11mm Weaver Picatinny Mount Rails
features: Adjustment knobs : 3 brightness scope levels for both 3 colors red/green/blue ,which can fit for all light condition,unaffected by extreme weather conditions.Finger adjustable rheostat enables user-controlled brightness of the red/green/blue dot.

Wide field of view: 5 MOA Red scopes with 30mm reflex lens aperture provides a wide field of view of (19m at 100m),suitable for aim and instant lock on target and rapid moving things. Unlimited field of view offers target scanning over the total field of engagement.
Fully Multi-Coated: Multi-coated optics with anti-reflective coating reduces light loss and glare due to reflection offering a brighter, higher-contrast image.
Changeable rail mount: Detachable weaver or picatinny rail mount has 11mm and 20mm. Two modes to attach and precision windage and elevation adjustments feature quick release mount.
Durability and lightweight: Made of aluminum alloy. Dust proof, shock proof and fog proof.Right for handguns, rimfire rifles, shotguns, pistols, black powders and crossbows.
description: Aomekie Scope Sight is one of the best - value multi - purpose sights we've ever been able to offer
Versatile, tactical, and above all, affordable!
Versatile, tactical, and above all, affordable!
Aomekie has managed to pack so many pro-grade features into this advanced RGB Sight
Aomekie has managed to pack so many pro-grade features into this advanced RGB Sight
Mil-style reticle has three colors of dots: RED for all light conditions, GREEN for dusk or dawn, and BLUE for low light conditions.
Mil-style reticle has three colors of dots: RED for all light conditions, GREEN for dusk or dawn, and BLUE for low light conditions.
Plus, it's lightweight enough for small-caliber arms, but plenty durable for any hunting rifle.
Plus, it's lightweight enough for small-caliber arms, but plenty durable for any hunting rifle.

- 3/8" & 5/8" integrated rail mount fits 11mm & 20mm base- 1X magnification; - Field of View: 57FT@100 YDS - Reticle: 5 MOA dot- Optimum Eye Relief : Unlimited- 50-yd. parallax setting - 1/2-click adjustment - 45-45 adjustment range - 30 mm objective lens diameter- Standard 3 Volt Lithium Battery included (CR2032) - Weighs just 5 ozs
1x Blue/Red/Green Dot Scope  1x CR2032 Battery 1x Cleaning Cloth1x lens cover 1x Instructions
